languages.text: Температура неумолимо падает. Многие члены экспедиции страдают от обморожений, другие же утратили стойкость и пали духом.
The temperature inexorably plummets. Many members of the expedition suffer from frostbite, while others lose their fortitude and morale.
languages.original_text: Температура неумолимо падает. Многие члены экспедиции страдают от обморожений, другие же утратили стойкость и пали духом.

traits.locale_text: The temperature inexorably plummets. Many members of the expedition suffer from frostbite, while others lose their fortitude and morale.
The temperature inexorably plummets. Many members of the expedition suffer from frostbite, while others lose their fortitude and morale.
The temperature inexorably plummets. Many members of the expedition suffer from frostbite, while others lose their fortitude and morale.
The temperature inexorably plummets. Many members of the expedition suffer from frostbite, while others lose their fortitude and morale.

languages.text: 气温无情地骤降，许多队员被冻伤了，而剩下的人则失去了继续探索的毅力与斗志。
languages.original_text: The temperature inexorably plummets. Many members of the expedition suffer from frostbite, while others lose their fortitude and morale.

traits.locale_text: 气温无情地骤降，许多队员被冻伤了，而剩下的人则失去了继续探索的毅力与斗志。

languages.text: 気温は容赦なく下がっていく。調査部隊のメンバーの多くが凍傷を負い、根気と気力を失う者もいる。
languages.original_text: The temperature inexorably plummets. Many members of the expedition suffer from frostbite, while others lose their fortitude and morale.

traits.locale_text: 気温は容赦なく下がっていく。調査部隊のメンバーの多くが凍傷を負い、根気と気力を失う者もいる。

languages.text: La temperatura desciende inexorablemente. Muchos miembros de la expedición sufren a causa de la escarcha, mientras que otros pierden la entereza y la moral.
languages.original_text: The temperature inexorably plummets. Many members of the expedition suffer from frostbite, while others lose their fortitude and morale.

traits.locale_text: La temperatura desciende inexorablemente. Muchos miembros de la expedición sufren a causa de la escarcha, mientras que otros pierden la entereza y la moral.

languages.text: La température s'effondre inexorablement. Plusieurs membres de l'expédition souffrent d'engelures, tandis que d'autres sont démoralisés par la situation.
languages.original_text: The temperature inexorably plummets. Many members of the expedition suffer from frostbite, while others lose their fortitude and morale.

traits.locale_text: La température s'effondre inexorablement. Plusieurs membres de l'expédition souffrent d'engelures, tandis que d'autres sont démoralisés par la situation.

languages.text: Die Temperatur sinkt unweigerlich. Viele Expeditionsmitglieder erleiden Frostbeulen, andere verlieren den Mut, und die Moral leidet.
languages.original_text: The temperature inexorably plummets. Many members of the expedition suffer from frostbite, while others lose their fortitude and morale.

traits.locale_text: Die Temperatur sinkt unweigerlich. Viele Expeditionsmitglieder erleiden Frostbeulen, andere verlieren den Mut, und die Moral leidet.

languages.text: Sıcaklık aniden düşmüştü. Keşif üyelerinin birçoğu soğuk ısırmasından şikayetçiydi, diğerleriyse cesaretlerini ve morallerini kaybetmişti.
languages.original_text: The temperature inexorably plummets. Many members of the expedition suffer from frostbite, while others lose their fortitude and morale.

traits.locale_text: Sıcaklık aniden düşmüştü. Keşif üyelerinin birçoğu soğuk ısırmasından şikayetçiydi, diğerleriyse cesaretlerini ve morallerini kaybetmişti.
